name: Mortal Kombat Q-edition
description:
A remastering for MK1, with 1 Character (obviously Scorpion). You are able to play only in multiplayer mode and with just scorpion :D

actually this game was built by myself for the purpose of learning game development  and satisfying my nostalogic feeling for this game. So it contains lots of bugs, i mean a lot, just try to enjoy (especially the sound when Scorpion jumps :P)

Feel free to share your ideas with me, i will appreciate it :)

contact me with my email Email .

Tnx 🙌
